      • translate

        public static java.util.Collection<RESTPermission> translate(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)
        Translate a list of Permissions into a list of RESTPermissions. A Permission can have multiple actions but a RESTPermission can have only 1, so we have to create multiple RESTPermissions of 1 Permission. These RESTPermissions have the same resource field, but a different action field.
        Parameters:
        permissions - a collection of Permissions.
        Returns:
        a collection of RESTPermissions

      • getAllRESTPermissions

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,RESTPermission> getAllRESTPermissions()
        Returns:
        a Map that contains all possible combinations of RESTPermissions. The map projects an id of a RESTPermission to the object itself.
